ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions to make useful (and pretty) plots for scientific plotting. Additional plotting features are added for base plotting, with particular emphasis on making attractive log axis plots.
Functions to make useful (and pretty) plots for scientific plotting. Additional plotting features are added for base plotting, with particular emphasis on making attractive log axis plots.

name: r-magicaxis
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.5.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-magicaxis
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/magicaxis_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/magicaxis/magicaxis_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 52866ea96b99036de4baea8e3436665427831fe31f7ccccccad2ca465c8627f7

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-rann
    - r-celestial >=1.4.1
    - r-mapproj
    - r-plotrix
    - r-sm
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-rann
    - r-celestial >=1.4.1
    - r-mapproj
    - r-plotrix
    - r-sm

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('magicaxis')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('magicaxis')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=magicaxis
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Functions to make useful (and pretty) plots for scientific plotting. Additional plotting features are added for base plotting, with particular emphasis on making attractive log axis plots.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - npavlovikj

# Package: magicaxis
# Type: Package
# Title: Pretty Scientific Plotting with Minor-Tick and Log Minor-Tick Support
# Version: 2.0.10
# Date: 2019-07-05
# Author: Aaron Robotham
# Maintainer: Aaron Robotham <aaron.robotham@uwa.edu.au>
# Description: Functions to make useful (and pretty) plots for scientific plotting. Additional plotting features are added for base plotting, with particular emphasis on making attractive log axis plots.
# License: GPL-3
# Suggests: imager
# Imports: grDevices, graphics, stats, celestial (>= 1.4.1), MASS, plotrix, sm, mapproj, RColorBrewer
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-07-05 03:41:00 UTC; aaron
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-07-05 04:30:03 UTC
